title: The problem with Riot, and these free mystery skins to selected players.
body:
I can't condone this, they are basically giving a birthday present to a parasite. You see, people given these freebies are the type of people which say things like
"Please report x for wasting everyone's time :("
"It's okay we can still win, plz carriey vane  senpai" (meanwhile they are 0/6)
"I love u all, even though I have never met u"

Do things like:
feed their opposing laner and defend themselves by saying things like "plz be nice so wat I got outplayed I still deserve u guise to win for mei" 
Have no strategy, just d suck everyone and pray their euphoric presence will win them a free game.

replies.body:
Because Riot likes positive players better than nut sacks that think they're good and rage at everyone.

He is upset because all the positive players, who aren't necessarily good at this game got mystery gifts from Riot for good behaviour, whilst he didn't get one because, well, I think you know what reason.
